Let's head for the park (put belt on to carry it)

1.content:
You (Jay) and your friend Denise are out walking when you decide to check out a garage sale. There's the usual assortment of knick knacks and musty old clothes, along with a few mildly amusing items that you both briefly play with. Like the WWII era helmet and the nurse hat, the hula hoop, the chair that immediately breaks. You quickly look back and forth before quietly walking away from it, as Denise looks on with a smirk.
Denise is ready to go, holding a large red wig over her long brown hair, when you notice a funky looking belt. It looks like something out of Star Wars, and think you're buddy Aj would love it, as hes a huge star wars fan.

As you pay the old man sitting out front, he smiles, and says "Thats a quality belt there, treat it well."

"Ummm, sure man."

You and Denise walk off, and she asks, "Do you wanna go give that belt to Aj now, or you wanna keep walking?"

You say...
1.title: Finding a belt...

choices: Oooh, a shiny red button! Time to press it.
Ok, this thing is stupid, time to take it off and give to Aj
11.content:
You put the belt on and start fiddling with the half dozen knobs. "Hey," you say, "theres even a Knob with the year on it!"
"Prolly so the old geezer didn't forget which century he was in." Denise says and starts to laugh. "Whats this thing here, looks like it comes off."
You grab one of the disks on the side of the belt, and sure enough it pops right off. A latch releases and a velcro strap comes out. "It even comes with some special bracelets! Here, don't say I never got you nothing."
"Oh whoopie, just what I always wanted! A bracelet to match your wierd belt," replies Denise sarcastically. Though she still puts on the bracelet.
You've checked out the belt, and fiddled with everything except the red button on the center...
11.title: Examining the belt

choices: What happened?
111.content:
You press the button... and nothing happens. You press again... and still nothing happens. "Well thats anti-climactic," you say. You take off the belt and just as you are about to put it in your bag you notice a little panel on the inside. Its a space for batteries!

"Well DUH!" says Denise. "If its gonna light up and do anything you gotta have power, dork."

You and Denise both have a quick laugh before she takes a battery out of her pocket. You insert the battery and put the belt back on. "Ok, here goes!" You press down the button again...and there's a bright flash of light!

The last thing you remember before you pass out is Denise yelping as she's startled by the light...
111.title: Oooh, a shiny red button! Time to press it.

choices: You set the dial back to your year
You just quickly turned the dial to go anywhere else
Malfunction!
1111.content:
You awaken to Denise shaking you and yelling in your ear "WAKE UP!"

You open your eyes to see her standing over you, hands on your shoulders. "What happened?" you ask her.

"I don't know, but I just woke up and now we're in this forest."

You get up and quickly survey your surroundings. Just like she said, you're in a sparse forest. Suddenly you both hear a trumpet sounding a military trumpet call a ways off to your left. "Well," you say, "at least there's people that way. Let's go."

You both start walking and after a minute arrive at the edge of the forest and are the top of a hill. Looking down you see what looks like a column of men in old military dress open fire on several people on horses. As you watch you realize the people falling off the horses aren't doing some war reenactment, they really are dieing! Denise realizes it at the same time and clutches your arm in horror.

As the last remaining Indians ride off on the horses, you look down at the belt and notice the year is set on 1875. You time traveled to 1875!

You realize you've been spotted by the soldiers as they start moving in your direction, and you decide it might be better to get out of here. You turn the dial and press the red button and see another bright flash of light!
1111.title: What happened?

choices: You're both suddenly in what appears to be a dense jungle
Chameleon effect
11111.content:
You set the dial back to the present and press the red button. A flash of bright light and suddenly you're back to your own time.
But where's Denise? Uh oh...
You're about to yell for her when you hear a loud clanging sound, and hear Denise say ouch. Where is she?
"Denise?" you tentatively call. She responds momentarily with an "Over here!" She's inside the garage you're standing next to. Right about where she was standing when you left 1875.
"Nice landing girl."
"Shut up loser. It ain't easy going from a forest to someones garage!"
"You're the only loser I see here, you lost your footing!"
"Oh haha, funny guy, funny guy. Now that we're not being shot at, what else can that belt do?"
"Ummm, lets see, theres the time traveling controls on this side. And on this side looks like something else. What do you make of them" you ask.
Denise kneels down and starts turning one of the dials. "Only one way to find out!" she says, as she quickly presses the button.
11111.title: No longer behind the times

choices: What now?
111111.content:
You look around at your new surroundings, thought you have no idea where you are. "Denise?" you call out.
"I'm coming!" you hear her yell back. She comes running out of the wierd trees and is soon back with you. "Any idea where we are now?"
"Don't know," you reply, "but lets check it out."
You both start walking, and suddenly you realize you seem very light.
"Do you feel kinda light too?" you ask Denise.
"Yeah, kinda."
Hmm, wonder how high I can jump you think. You jump and are suddenly at the tip of the wierd trees. You've easily jumped to twice your current height. And you know where you are.
"We're still outside that garage," you quickly tell Denise. "We've shrunken."
"What?" replies Denise
You look at the belt and see the dials she turned. the first has a zero, while the second has a 1 on it. "We must be one inch tall."

"Yeah, I was wondering about that too, but you're wearing the bracelet thing so that must be pulling you along too." you reply.
"Oh yeah! Duuuhhhh! Well now, we could go anywhere, do almost anything. What's next on the docket?"
Thats a good question. You could play around more with the size features, or you could go nearly anywhere in time. Which do you want to do first?

You and Denise make your way over to her house, but just as you arrive Katie is leaving with her friend Jamie for the party. Seeing Katie get into Jamie's car, Denise looks crestfallen that you guys missed your chance."Well that sucks." she says. "Guess me gotta find other people to spy on then."

"No we don't," You reply. "We just have to go back about twenty minutes and jump into her purse."

"Oh yeah! Good thing we're doing this together. I'd be lost on my own."

You both head inside and go into the living room. "She always leaves her purse here on the corner of the couch." Denise explains. "Drives me nuts sometimes."

"Ok," you reply. "Lets get on the cushion and shrink, then we'll go back and we can easily jump in." You both get on the cushion and you quickly shrink yourselves down to 1 inch. Then you set the time controls for twenty minutes in the past, and off you go!

1111111111.content:
The flash of time travel light fades, and sure enough there's Katie's pink purse, leaning over and several different shades of lipstick spilling out.

"See what I have to deal with!" Denise exclaims. "She can be such a slob sometimes."
Just then Katie walks in talking on her phone and doing her hair at the same time. You look at each other and then take off at a dead run for the purse. Katie is still talking on the phone so she must not have noticed the both of you, and you sigh in relief. Katie finishes her phone call and picks up her purse, dropping her phone into it. It barely misses Denise, and she gives you a worried look. You can tell shes having second thoughts, seeing as you're both so small and helpless, and that phone could have easily injured her. You bring your finger to your lips to signal her to stay quiet and she nods. The swaying of the purse has stopped as Katie sets it down on the counter, and suddenly little sample bottles of liquor drop all around the both of you.

You both huddle within the purse in silence for a while longer, staring at the giant sample bottles, lipstick, and phone, among other feminine items. Suddenly a horn honks and you hear Katie yell "I'm coming." You quickly brace yourself against the nearest inner pocket of the purse, and with a lurch your ride takes off. After some jostling, the purse settles down and all you hear is Katie and Jamie singing along to Velvet Revolver.

You start to leverage yourself up to look out when Denise suddenly pulls you back down. "What are you doing!?!"

"I'm taking a look out." you reply. "That is the point of this whole thing." You pop your head out and look upon Katie's giant legs swaying to the music above you. You're amazed and mesmerized at the leg muscles effortless movement.

Suddenly Denise pops her head up too and quietly says "Wow. This is such a different perspective. She used to perform ballet ya know. Hey, check it out over there," she suddenly says pointing. You nod with appreciation at the towers of muscle before looking where Denise is pointing, and see its Jamie's purse. "We should get in that one instead. I already know Katie pretty well, but almost nothing of Jamie."

That could be interesting you think. Jamie is really damn hot, and could have a more organized purse that wouldn't be such a handful. Plus she's got a huge rack.

But then again those legs of Katie's look so powerful, and it might not be such a good idea to wander off with strangers, at least not till you have a better handle on how you can move around at this size.

The next thing you know, you are standing in front of the women's rest room.

"Well, aren't you coming in with me?" Denise inquires, as she pulls you on after her anyway.

"Why would I do that?" you ask, feeling confused.

"Well, I hate to break the news to you, but you are a woman now."

Looking at your reflection, you gasp. "No wonder my voice and body feel foreign to me."

"Ya think?"

"Very funny," you mutter, as you peruse the new woman you are now. You were almost 6 feet tall, and now you are about 5 feet 7 inches, with large breasts, and a more or less petite figure. Long, curly, jet black hair is pulled back from the side of your face hangs down to the middle of your back. There is just the faintest touch of gray in your bangs, while there are light crows feet and fine lines on your face. You are wearing black capris, silver tennis shoes, and a teal blue long sleeved blouse. A string of pearls hang around your neck, and fancy rings are on your fingers. The time belt seems to somehow fit right in.

"How could this happen?"

"I'm not really sure, but I think we better call you Jayne now," Denise laughs.

"Maybe I could still be Jaye, just with an "e" on the end instead. Wait a minute, how can I possibly be a woman when all we are doing is time traveling?" you say, not enjoying having to make this adjustment.

"I see the two of you are a bit confused," she says.

"My name is Tanya and this is Jason. We're time agents."

"Aren't you a bit...well..."

"I think what Denise is trying to say...is..."

"...why am I so much older than Jason? I could ask you why you find yourself a woman.The answer to that is anything can happen when you time travel, and that is why we make sure time agents are paired up."

"Yeah, you getta used ta it affer while."

"Well, that is just lovely to know," you sniff, amazed how much more feminine even your actions and reactions have become.

"At least you know it now, and be grateful your clothes changed with the shift. It's not much fun to have an outfit that looks old when you're young, or too young when you are older."

"Sometimes, da cwothes be too big, an nudder times dey gets to small. Could I go gitta corn dog ?" Tanya gave him some money and sent him off.

"That must be hard having a partner so much younger than you. At least," Denise said looking at me," my partner Jayne is about the same age, though both of us are older than we're used to dear. "

"Well, now you are partners in time travel, and time agents as well. First off, to dispell rumors to the contrary, you don't have to worry about meeting yourselves."

"We don't?" I replied.

"No, due to the fact that your bodies shift in age, size, gender, even race at times to assure this does not occur. Things also work that if one of you gets too old or young, the other will be somewhat more stable when you shift. You may also find after travelling you get even older or even younger, sometimes suddenly but usually gradually. If you are in danger of getting too young or old, you will find that things go into auto pilot and you will travel into another time."

"Is that all sweetie?" Denise moaned, contemplating the ramifications.

"Almost. You will also find there are times you have to care for one another if the your partner gets too old or young. And this does mean changing their diapers, helping the other get around, and a variety of other things."

"I hate to ask this, but can we even go home again?"

"Well..."

"Eeeek, this is something my Aunt Gladys would wear, and with tan polyester slacks...it's...it's..."

"I can see the family resemblance,"laughed Denise, as she found suddenly found herself a flat chested ten year old in a bratz t-shirt, blue jeans, and tennis shoes with her hair in pigtails. "What the...my chest..."

"...laugh at me will you girlie girl," Jayne chuckled.

"Well, fine, I'm going to join Jason at the playground," she said as she ran off.

Creases had formed around the sides of her mouth, crows feet deepened, she wore elegant older woman's squared glasses on a wooden beaded chain, her breasts had lowered a touch and her neck had started to get wobbly. Slight jowls were showing, and she noted her voice was a bit raspier, deeper in tone. Her eyes had gotten slight bags, and she wore a girdle as well.

"Yes, honey. We agents have to stick together. No matter what, you are now paired with your partner. As for what you do as time agents, just keep going and you'll be where you need to be when we need you there, and in the condition we need you--whether young or old, male or female, fat or skinny," she said as a large sized girl in her late teens came up to their table with a middle aged business man in tow, as they watched Tanya visibly get younger and younger until a baby in diapers sat there before them.

"Looks like it's time for her diaper change," laughed Jason, as Jayne found herself leaning on a cane, wearing bifocals, her hair now completely white.

"Looks like we best be a goin, eh dearie?" she said as the belt went off, and she and Denise vanished.

111122.content:
One look around and you know you must be in the future. You’re in some kind of large city with a dome. A man holding some kind of device is standing just a few feet from you looking at you with a startled look on his face. He then looks at your belt and says, “Ah, you’re time agents”. He then comes up and shakes you hands. “Anything I can do to help”, he says with a smile.

Thinking quickly you say, “Yes there is. We’re having a problem with our spatial displacement temporal locater. Where and when are we”, you ask making up a lot using stuff you’ve seen in science fiction show. “Oh, well that’s easy you’re in New Chicago and it’s the year 2113”, he answers. “What’s with the dome”, you ask out of curiosity? His expression changes slightly and he says, “It’s to keep out the glaciers. All the northern cities have had them for years”.

“Glaciers, how can you have glaciers? What about global warming”, Denise blurts out? Now he really does get a concerned look on his face. “I don’t know anything about global warming. When are you two from? You do know that time travel is prohibited and can only be done by time agents and selected scientists,” he says, backing away. You quickly respond by saying, “My partner is new and still gets disoriented in the time jumps. I can’t tell you when we are from exactly except by saying the future. We’re having a global warming problem there and we’re trying to trace back to when it started.

The man relaxes some and says, “No warming here friend. We’ve been in an Ice Age for the past 80 years. I do remember now something about global warming in the beginning of the 21st century, but that turned out to be BS. It seems that the earth warms up slightly right before an ice age. It was a normal cycle, but the scientists of the time misinterpreted it, and blamed it on man-made emissions. They passed a lot of regulations and restrictions on the burning of fossil fuels. It destabilized the world economy and caused a fuel shortage. When the cold hit, more than half the world population died as a result. You guys probably know all this though”.

Shocked by this, but managing to keep a cool face you thank the man and he goes on his way. Denise on the other hand is more emotional. “I don’t think I want to know anymore about the future”, she says.

So what do you choose from?

The light of traveling fades, and you see by the clocktower it's now 8:50. Looking just beyond it you see the magnificent hues of purple and orange, as the sun sets on the day.

"Wasn't it closer to noon when we left?" Denise asks.

The first a woman, who Jay would assume was Latina if not for the single white horn that grew out of her the center of her for head, the second was a large man who inspite of looking to be no more then 30 had completely white hair and instead of his left arm had a robotic replacement.

If you weren't there we wouldn't have caught the guy. We owe you our thanks, and since you've been treated so badly the Time Agency decided you should have some fun before being sent back."

Jay just stares stunned, but that's nothing to what happens next. The woman, without warning is replaced by a long curly pink haired woman, with pale skin and perfect curves. She was dressed in juat a light pink tube top and darker pink ruffled short skirt that barely contained her crotch. Strangest of all she starts rubbing herself all over in a way that drove Jay wild.

Jay completely confused lookes to the male agent who proceeds to also be replaced with a beutiful woman. This one was slightly tan and had ginger hair in a low ponytail and only wore what looked like a pink sports bra.

"Um, what?" Jay said completely confused.

"Go on touch us. This is your reward." The ginger girl says in a monotone "we transformed for your pleasure."

Jay stood up and the couch vanished as he did. "Transformed? So you're still the same cops?"

"Of course silly, what did you think we teleported? That would be geode negligence of the tech." The pink one said cheerfully.

"Could.. Could I transform to? " Jay asks curiously.

"In this room you could be whatever you want, just concentrate" the bottomless ginger girl explained.

"You can even change your mind, though it will all go back when you leave. It's holograms like in the show Star Trek from your time, of course the show Star Trek in our time is a documentary show about the journey to different stars, this season is Betelgeuse" the perky pink one rambled.

"Ok, I'm going to try this" Jay said concentrating. In a flash where Jay once stood was now a resplendid purple haired woman who wore a bra, puffy princess sleeves and a long flowing skirt that exposes her hips all in purple with light blue accents and belt. Someone ran out of grass before they were meant to, so they refilled sooner, maybe didn't have money for groceries or something when they needed it, etc, etc. Its nearly impossible to tell what exactly caused this change, or if its even possible to change it back."

Until you know what the future is like, it would probably be best to go undetected. Quickly you press the button to activate another size change. Wait, did you have the settings right to go smaller?

Apparently not, as suddenly you shoot up and hit your head on the underside of the sink. You fall back from hitting your head, and the emerald color clothed hottie you were admiring a moment before yelps in surprise, and jumps back as you keep on growing.

When the whole process is done, your head is wedged beneath the sink in quite an uncomfortable position, head facing away from the door. Each leg is trapped in a stall across the room, and being careful to not break anything and leave a lasting impression you don't move much. Your hands are free, but there's not much you can do since you can't see the settings on the belt. And there's the emerald clad beauty, standing in front of your face gazing at you in wonder at your sudden appearance and size.

Not knowing what else to do you simply say "Hello."

123131.content:
"I, umm, seem to have gotten myself in a jam here." you say.

"I would certainly say so!" exclaims the woman.

"Would you mind helping me out? One of these dials changes my size, but I'm still not entirely certain which side does that. Could you help me out and turn it to 6 feet?"

She looks dumbfounded for a second, that you would even be asking for her help, let alone need it. She takes a moment to work her jaw up and down, before saying, "Sure, I suppose so." She moves out of sight range from you, and goes over and turns one of the dials. "Ok, you're all set. Now how does it happen?"

"Stand back a little bit, and I'll be down to size in a second." you respond. Pressing the button, you start to shrink and immediately feel relief from where the sink was pressing against your head. "By the way, whats you name?"

"My name is Tabitha." she responds. But did she put the settings right?

As you shrink you move into a sitting position and turn your gaze toward Tabitha. "Thank you very much for the help Tabitha, my name is Jay."

Tabitha reaches out a hand to help you up, which you gladly take. "How did you get something like that belt? That is seriously awesome."

Fully erect again, you rub your head a little and say, "Bought it at a garage sale, though I thought it was a toy. Me and my friend got attacked by some guy, the belt got activated, and I wound up here. So I decided to play around with it a bit before I went back and figure it all out."

"Wicked. Any chance that thing can bring me with you? I would love to change size and explore time with you. And does it do anything else?"

"I don't know, lets look at this thing a bit." You both look over the belt and find no more dials than the time and size changing ones, but you do find some detachable bracelets, and surmise that they must bring others with the belt wearer. You play around with the settings and change size a couple times, and Tabitha changes size as well, staying just an inch taller than you the whole time with her massive heals on.

"This is so awesome. But I assume you want to go save your friend now?"

"Yeah, though lets be seven feet tall so we can easily deal with that guy." You change the settings and activate the belt, disappearing in a flash of light to the past. But what is it like when you get back?

You finally stop at about 3 inches tall, and then Tabitha grabs you. She's now holding you tight enough that you can't move, but at least she isn't crushing you. Looking over you carefully, you now see she even has green eyes, matching the rest of her emerald outfit. She then takes a hair band out of her hair, and uses it to bind you tight, and proceeds to remove the belt from your waist.

"What are you going to do to me?" you ask her.

"I havn't decided on that yet, but it certainly wouldn't do to let you escape from me using this belt again!" she says. Here she loops the belt through one of her earrings. "For now though, since you were such an easy capture I'll give you a little reward." At this she takes you and stuffs you in her bra. "Now be a good little boy, and we're gonna have some fun when we get back to my place. You can tell me all about this fun little belt you had on!"

Oh boy, what have you gotten yourself into now?

info.brief_description: Time Travel! When will you go, what will you see?
info.description:
You are Jay, a 21 year old college student who's taking the current year off from school. At a garage sale you find a belt from the future. The belt has controls that can easily let you choose whenever you want to go, and on the other side has controls that depend on the story line.
It also has bracelets that link the bracelet wearer to the belt wearer, so others can travel with you. Where it goes from there is up to everyone who reads and hopefully adds.

Please add, but a few rules.
1- Don't kill off any main characters, though abandoning, or losing a limb are fine, because someone else can always write a re-entrance.
2- Nothing that would be illegal, like underage sex
3- More than 2 sentences if you add

And remember, HAVE FUN with this. =D

P.S. If you do find a story line you want to continue, but neither of the choices are appealing, just add what you want and send me a message about changing the choice that you chose to continue
